text.section: All court records relating to a petition for an emergency evaluation made under this subtitle are confidential and the contents may not be divulged, by subpoena or otherwise, except by order of the court on good cause shown.

A petition for an emergency evaluation:
Shall be considered a mental health record under Title 4 of this article; and
May be released by a health care provider, as defined in § 4-301 of this article, only as permitted by law.
